tokens.text: checks if entity is out of control

description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is out of control (has the `out_of_control` component), else it returns 0.0. Applies generally to boats and chest boats.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Out Of Control
generated_doNotEdit.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is out of control, else it returns 0.0.
